uchicago.src.repastdemos.neural
Class Boss

java.lang.Object
  uchicago.src.sim.network.DefaultNode
      uchicago.src.sim.network.DefaultDrawableNode
          uchicago.src.repastdemos.neural.Boss
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoStepable, Drawable2DGridNode, DrawableNonGridNode, Moveable, NonGridDrawable, Node
Direct Known Subclasses:
Consultant
public class Boss
extends DefaultDrawableNode
implements AutoStepable

This class represents the agent who gives orders to the employees. These agents don't actually praise or punish the agents according to their actions. The Consultant does that.

Version:
$Revision: 1.1 $ $Date: 2005/08/12 20:04:54 $
Author:
Jerry Vos
See Also:
Consultant
